title: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A traditional Italian pasta dish made with eggs, hard cheese, pancetta, and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: A popular Indian dish featuring marinated chicken cooked in a creamy tomato sauce with spices.

title: Beef Bourguignon
summary: A French stew made with beef braised in red wine, beef broth, and seasoned with garlic, onions, and mushrooms.

title: Vegetarian Chili
summary: A hearty and spicy chili made with beans, tomatoes, and a variety of vegetables, perfect for meatless meals.

title: Thai Green Curry
summary: A fragrant and spicy Thai curry made with green curry paste, coconut milk, vegetables, and your choice of protein.

title: Classic Caesar Salad
summary: A timeless salad featuring romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, and a creamy Caesar dressing.

title: Homemade Pizza Margherita
summary: A simple yet delicious pizza topped with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, basil, and a drizzle of olive oil.

title: Banana Bread
summary: A moist and sweet bread made with ripe bananas, perfect for breakfast or as a snack.

title: Shrimp Scampi
summary: A flavorful dish of shrimp cooked in a garlicky, buttery sauce with a splash of white wine, served over pasta.

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
summary: A decadent dessert with a gooey, molten chocolate center, served warm with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.
